channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro, Inc. -- Trend Micro Antivirus One
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro, Inc. -- Trend Micro Antivirus One

item.title: CVE-2024-45335|2024-10-22T19:18:07.198Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20antivirus%20one
item.description: Trend Micro Antivirus One, version 3.10.4 and below contains a vulnerability that could allow an attacker to use a specifically crafted virus to allow itself to bypass and evade a virus scan detection.

item.title: CVE-2024-45334|2024-10-22T19:21:43.182Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20antivirus%20one
item.description: Trend Micro Antivirus One versions 3.10.4 and below (Consumer) is vulnerable to an Arbitrary Configuration Update that could allow unauthorized access to product configurations and functions.

item.title: CVE-2024-45334|2024-10-22T18:27:10.686Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20antivirus%20one
item.description: Trend Micro Antivirus One versions 3.10.4 and below (Consumer) is vulnerable to an Arbitrary Configuration Update that could allow unauthorized access to product configurations and functions.

item.title: CVE-2024-45335|2024-10-22T18:27:58.171Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20antivirus%20one
item.description: Trend Micro Antivirus One, version 3.10.4 and below contains a vulnerability that could allow an attacker to use a specifically crafted virus to allow itself to bypass and evade a virus scan detection.
